pages.text: Lizards are a common animal, but they often see a grim demise.

They are known for their wide variety in their appearance, and indistinguishable, dry, scale covered skin.$(2br)Lizards are mostly carnivorous, showing stong interest in spider eyes, silver scales, venomous fangs and other sorts of insects and insect remains.
They are often found in

forests and deserts, as their favorite thing is lying under the sun, on a rock or on a tree.$(2br)Lizards usually have one of two possible destinies: they are either kept as a pet, or their legs are cut off by witches, who then use them as an important ingredient in many of their brews. Not the best death.$(2br)$(o)You're a lizard, Harry!
